drift_log_entries.description: The OrchestratorAgent, located at app/agents/orchestrator_agent.py, possesses a @register(key="orchestrator", ...) decorator, indicating an intent to be registered. However, during runtime (e.g., loop_0030a and loop_0030b executions in Batch 22.1), the agent was not found in the AGENT_REGISTRY. Execution logs (e.g., /home/ubuntu/logs/loop_0030a_execution.log) show an import error: "ERROR:app.agents:An unexpected error occurred while importing orchestrator_agent: unexpected indent (task_supervisor.py, line 405)". This prevented its successful registration despite the presence of the decorator.
evidence: Error message in /home/ubuntu/logs/loop_0030a_execution.log: "ERROR:app.core.agent_registry:Agent with key 'Orchestrator' not found in registry."
Error message in /home/ubuntu/logs/loop_0030a_execution.log: "ERROR:app.agents:An unexpected error occurred while importing orchestrator_agent: unexpected indent (task_supervisor.py, line 405)"
drift_log_entries.assumed_creation_phase: Phase 21 (based on user context and task history; direct file tree evidence for creation batch not immediately available from current context).
drift_log_entries.recommended_action: Investigate and fix the import error (unexpected indent in task_supervisor.py or related dependency) preventing orchestrator_agent.py from being successfully imported and registered. Recovery planned for Phase 28 or at Operator approval.
